programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Most cooks are under the impression that good soup takes all day to prepare. We'll show you how to make simplified versions of two favorite soups: chicken noodle and Italian pasta and bean.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Soup for supper is an appealing concept, especially on a cold night. But for soup to work as a main course, it better be hearty. Our vibrant lentil soup fits the bill, and we round out this meal with quick cheese bread.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Some local dishes become so popular that they transcend their region. Gumbo is a taste of Louisiana in a big old bowl. And Cincinnati chili is American original, served with buttered spaghetti, kidney beans, cheddar cheese, and chopped onions.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: It sometimes seems the simplest recipes suffer the worst fate in modern cookbooks. The test kitchen was committed to breathing new life into these old-fashioned American recipes: stuffed pork chops, gravy, and glazed carrots.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We offer two inspired takes on roast chicken. Our roast lemon chicken ends with a twist. And there's nothing conventional about cooking a butterflied chicken under a brick. But these two recipes both deliver crisp skin and lots of flavors.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Quick and easy weeknight cooking can still yield great results. We start with two quick-cooking classics— sautéed chicken cutlets and pan-seared shrimp—and elevate them from the everyday.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we offer delicious, relatively straightforward fare that appeals to young and old. What kid—or adult—doesn't look forward to macaroni and cheese or barbecued chicken?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We take some of our favorite restaurant recipes—Crab Towers and Flambéed Pan-Roasted Lobster—and show you how to make them work in a home kitchen.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Huge meaty flavor—combined with spice, smoke, and fire—epitomizes Texas barbecue. Could we figure out how to make authentic Texas beef ribs in our Boston-based test kitchen?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: On occasion, we break the bank and buy a beef tenderloin. The tender, buttery interior is the big draw, and the combination of a healthy dose of seasoning and the flavor from the grill is a perfect solution to an otherwise mild-tasting piece of meat.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we prepare grilled chicken with a sweet-and-sour dipping sauce and grilled salmon with a sweet, sticky glaze.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we prepare chicken enchiladas and Mexican rice.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Host Bridget Lancaster makes One-Pot Chicken Jardinière, and Toni Tipton-Martin shares the history of cooking in one pot. Equipment expert Adam Ried reviews paring knives. Morgan Bolling makes One-Pan Mediterranean Shrimp.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Julia Collin Davison makes Italian Meatloaf. Jack Bishop shares substitutes for fresh garlic, and Morgan Bolling makes Asparagus Baked in Foil. Toni Tipton-Martin tells the immigrant origins of scampi, and Ashley Moore makes Chicken Scampi.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Bridget Lancaster makes Crispy Iowa Skinny sandwiches. Adam Ried reviews 12-inch nonstick skillets. Christie Morrison makes Boogaloo Wonderland Sandwiches, & Toni Tipton-Martin shares the its origin. Bryan makes St. Paul Sandwiches.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Bridget Lancaster makes Chicken Paprikash and Butter Spaetzle, and Toni Tipton-Martin shares the story of Hungarian immigrants in Cleveland. Adam Ried reviews wooden spoons. Ashley Moore makes weeknight-friendly Ground Beef Stroganoff.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Host Julia Collin Davison makes Bacon-Wrapped Pork Roast with Peach Sauce. Equipment expert Adam Ried reviews graters. Toni Tipton-Martin explores the rich German community in Texas, and Morgan Bolling makes Texas Potato Pancakes.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Host Bridget Lancaster makes Easy Steak Frites, and Toni Tipton-Martin shares the origin of french fries. Equipment expert Adam Ried shares his top pick for braisers. Bryan Roof makes French Onion Soup.

programme.title: Cook's Country

programme.title: Cook's Country

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: Julia at Home
programme.desc: Julia shares her recipe for easy broiled salmon with mustard and crisp dilled crust, orzo salad with cucumber, red onion, and mint, plus a pretty and pink berry fool for dessert

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's an auction apiece for Paul Laidlaw and Anita Manning as they reach the halfway point of their Antiques Road Trip. This leg sees them begin in South Cave in the East Riding of Yorkshire, aiming for auction in Twickenham, London.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Paul Laidlaw and Anita Manning head for round four at auction and they both have their eyes on the prize. Starting out in Navenby, Lincolnshire they make their way towards the penultimate auction in the Norfolk town of Diss.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's the final leg for road trippers Paul Laidlaw and Anita Manning. There are only a few pounds separating this competitive duo as they begin in Norwich, and head for a nail-biting final auction in Stamford, Licolnshire.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antique experts Christina Trevanion and Paul Laidlaw kick off a new season in Suffolk and Cambridgeshire. Armed with £200 each, and an ailing pickup truck, they shop up a storm before heading to an auction in Market Harborough.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques hunters Christina Trevanion and Paul Laidlaw shop across Gloucestershire and Northamptonshire before going head-to-head at an auction in Evesham, Worcestershire.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's leg two for auctioneers Charles Hanson and Raj Bisram, and they're taking their Triumph through Somerset, Dorset and Hampshire before ending at an auction in Swanmore.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts David Harper and Anita Manning go head-to-head as they road trip through North England and into southern and central Scotland, heading to an auction in Knutsford, Cheshire.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fine paintings of Hereford cattle turn up appropriately enough, when the experts visit the country town of Leominster in Herefordshire.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: In Manchester Town Hall the experts inspect locally made furniture, a clock with a disc musical box and an example of the latest in high-priced collectables: the wristwatch.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: French 18th-century snuff boxes, a Colt revolver and a pair of Chippendale library armchairs. From Royal Tunbridge Wells.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Sevres plates with false marks, a silver dachshund with a detachable head, and an early chest-on-chest ingeniously cut in half to fit a house, a rich mixture of treasures shown to the experts when they visit Hornchurch in Essex.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: In the last of the series the experts visit the Corn Exchange, Brighton, to see a group of Meissen figures, a china cat with a good pedigree and an unusual drop-leaf spider table.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.desc: A psychologist's advice does not sit well with Aimee and Ty; Ripsi asks Kerry for forgiveness.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: Highlights and unseen footage from the series; three housemates return for "Bad Girls Road Trip.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: The seven new roommates get off to an explosive start when there isn't enough free stuff to go around.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: The girls separate into two distinct cliques; P.J. shows the girls a good time.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: The tension between the Hyenas and the Party Girls boils over; Darlen and Neveen have a food fight.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club
programme.desc: The girls start to put aside their differences as Lyric goes after her dreams in the music industry.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon has a hard time getting through to the owner of the Black Light District, who's convinced fixing up his rancid dive would be a betrayal of his punk rock credo.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: The owner of City Bar compounded his troubles when he approved a poorly received fetish night, so Jon must help him come up with a new plan to whip up business.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon needs the nice-guy owner of Champagne's Cafe, a classic Vegas dive with a storied Mafia history, to start acting like a wise guy.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: When a military veteran/bar owner responds to criticism of his philanthropic work with nasty comments online, his business is sent into a tailspin.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A roller rink bar in a tiny desert town is in danger of closing for good if Jon can't get the hometown hero who owns it to take control.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon's attempt to save the YNot Sports Pub & Grub gets off to a bad start when there isn't enough staff on hand for a stress test.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: The Tradewinds bar could shut down for good if Jon can't get a lazy stepson to step into his new role as manager.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Rescuing the Russell City Grill & Sports Bar was already going to be a challenge, but a violent brawl makes Jon question if it's even worth saving.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Brother and sister owners develop a bitter sibling rivalry when they take over the historic Sam Jordan's bar in San Francisco.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: If Jon wants to save the mice-infested, touristy Fort One Bar & Lounge, he'll need to get the spoiled owner who was gifted the bar to stop taking it for granted.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A military hero about to be redeployed needs more than his bar rescued, as his problematic drinking threatens to cost him his livelihood and relationship.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: After suffering a personal tragedy, the former punk rocker and owner of the Triple Nickel Tavern nears rock bottom, but Jon's patience only goes so far.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon has to straighten out the abrasive owner of the St8 Pub, who has squandered a generous deal from the landlord and taken advantage of his mother financially.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: The owner of the Summit House Grill and Tap has pushed his marriage and business to the breaking point by drinking away his financial sorrows and hitting on female patrons.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Harvey and Mitch go to play poker on an offshore yacht where they are robbed by a masked man that drives an amphibious Jeep. Shauni invites Eddie over for dinner at her parents’ house where her snobbish father strongly disapproves of him.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Shauni and Eddie visit a local fortune teller who predicts that Eddie will soon meet his first true love. Shauni thought he already had, and that it was her! But it's Lorna, an older woman Eddie had a "Summer of '42" affair with as a teenager.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: The mysterious death of Mitch's uncle and the cryptic will he left, finds Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, and Shauni on a whitewater rafting adventure. Meanwhile, rookie lifeguard hopefuls participate in the annual qualifying swim.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A whitewater rafting trip turns deadly when Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, Shauni and CJ are pursued by the murderous miners that killed Mitch's uncle to get his map leading to the "Golden Boot" that Mitch and the others are now searching for.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Jimmy Slade and Matt Brody tangle with a violent surf gang, while Mitch's life is thrown into turmoil when former lover Stephanie Holden assumes co-command of Baywatch headquarters.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Summer and Matt face grueling personal and physical challenges in Rookie School, the "boot camp” of lifeguarding, while unusual circumstances force female odd couple CJ and Stephanie to share an apartment.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Hobie and Summer each find themselves torn between doing the right thing and giving in to dangerous social pressures.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Malibu Beach High students square off against the administration's plans to sell sacred Chumash Indian lands. And Garner quits the beach to work as a street cop again, only to be stuck in an office job by his vindictive captain.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Matt's tempestuous affair with a gorgeous motorcycle racer takes him to the brink, while Mitch and Stephanie go head-to-head in a spirited battle of the sexes.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A thrilling muscle boat competition is the backdrop for a whirlwind romance between Mitch and a beautiful woman he doesn't know is both a princess and the target of an assassination plot.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch and Stephanie board a yacht disguised as wealthy southern honeymooners to capture a group of modern-day pirates and find themselves oddly attracted to each other's undercover character.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch and Garner go undercover as a two-on-two street basketball team to solve a young athlete's murder. CJ becomes involved with an amorous, honeymooning Midwestern tourist.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A rock concert and political rally are the backdrop for a chilling assassination plot that finds CJ unconscious on an explosive-laden Scarab heading for the crowded pier.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A dispute between Mitch's lifeguard career and his father's desire to have him take over the family architecture business becomes intensified by devastating news about the elder Buchannon.

programme.desc: Bellator MMA is in Sioux Falls, South Dakota as Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu black belts collide in a matchup between the best submission specialists on the Bellator roster as Neiman Gracie clashes with Goiti Yamauchi.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator 285: Henderson vs. Queally was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA, that took place on 23 September 2022 at the 3Arena in Dublin, Ireland.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator 286: Pitbull vs. Borics was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA that took place on October 1, 2022, at the Long Beach Arena in Long Beach, California, United States.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator 287: Piccolotti vs. Barnaoui (also known as Bellator Milan) was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA, that took place on October 29, 2022, at the Allianz Cloud Arena in Milan, Italy.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator 288: Nemkov vs. Anderson 2 was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA that took place on November 18, 2022, at the Wintrust Arena in Chicago, Illinois, United States.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Pamela says she is likely going to jail for not complying with court orders because she refuses to allow her ex, Justin, his court-ordered visitations. Pamela says Justin attempted to drown their oldest daughter in the pool. Justin says they are lies!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Many were stunned and outraged when Casey Anthony was acquitted of murder charges in her daughter Caylee's death. Lead prosecutor Jeff Ashton joins Dr. Phil to answer some hard-hitting questions about where his case went wrong.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: McKinley, 18, says she decided 5 years ago she never wanted to see her dad, Cory, again, after learning he went to jail on two counts of sexual battery of a minor! She says her dad is a violent, dangerous, "psychopath". Cory says he's never abused anyone.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Waco & Alley left their home state with their 3-year-old child, missing a custody hearing, & have no idea the court then granted guardianship to Waco's parents. Tensions run high when Dr. Phil reveals to Waco & Alley they lost custody of their child!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Brooklyn, 18, says she is tired of her mom butting into her love life with boyfriend Eric. Mom Courtney says it's because Brooklyn's boyfriend has two children & a wife! Eric's wife, Mandy, wants Brooklyn to leave her husband alone & she'll fight for him.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Karen writes to Dr. Phil saying her husband mentally abuses her by telling her how fat she is, how terrible she looks, criticizes her makeup, calls her names, tells fat jokes. She hides in a bathroom to eat and he won't touch her "until she loses 200 lbs

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Was this teacher drunk In her elementary school classroom? Listen to what this educator has to say.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: David says daughter, Danielle, 21, is out of control. She's been arrested twice, once for "clocking" a man she was dating in the face, & the second for public intoxication. She has violent rages, refuses to take her meds, does drugs, & drives drunk.Pt. 1

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues his interview with Heather & Brian, feuding parents over 15-yr-old son Brandon's death. Hear from Brandon's friends, the last to see him alive and two of the young men make shocking allegations against Heather. How does she respond?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Christi says she was an Emmy-winning TV news reporter at the top of her career, but now her struggle with alcohol has left her jobless, homeless and estranged from her two adult daughters. Christi faces her girls for the first time in more than two years.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: It's Ask Dr. Phil day. Is it an attractive woman's responsibility to tone down her looks on the job? Debrahlee made headlines saying she was fired for being too pretty. She says she was told her figure, pencil skirts & 3-inch heels were too distracting.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Samantha & sister Sarah say mom, Stacy, is a successful teacher & behaviorist, but when it comes to 33-year-old brother, Ben, it's another story. Stacy says teaching Ben how to pay bills and to eat his veggies helps Ben. Ben says he's just stuck in a rut.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Summer Wells, 5, vanished from her Tennessee home, June 15, 2021. Parents Don & Candus claim abduction; online bullies say the opposite. Don & Candus meet with Scott Rouse & Greg Hartley, body language experts who work with the FBI, police and military.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Warren Jeffs, leader of the Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints & self-proclaimed prophet, was on the FBI's 10 Most Wanted Fugitives for unlawful flight & sexual conduct with a minor. Dr. Phil talks with FLDS member Willie Jessop.

channel.display-name: Best of The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: In an all-new Drew Gooder, Drew is surprising a deserving nurse and retired postal worker who founded a local chapter of non-profit to help underserved communities receive free or low-cost medical care.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews dive into amazing animal headlines in an all-new Drew's News: Dr. Drew-Little Edition. Then, competing viewers face-off in a Mac N Cheese cook-off you won't want to miss!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The cast of "Daisy Jones and the Six" talk with Drew about their new show! They're chatting all about the 70's theme of the show, their time on set and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew interviews President Joe Biden and First Lady Jill Biden, discussing their relationship and Christmas traditions. FLOTUS gives a tour of the White House Christmas Decorations.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew is joined by Hillary Rodham Clinton and her daughter Chelsea Clinton, who share what it was like going on adventures for new docuseries, "Gutsy.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: A Good Person" director and producer Zach Braff is telling Drew about the real-life inspiration behind his new film, working on it with Florence Pugh and why he got his pilot's license.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Queen Latifah shares behind-the-scenes stories. Chris Appleton does music teacher's hair. Drew's News w/ Ross Mathews & Mikel Welch. TikToker Sarah T. shows hack for lamp cords.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Honk for Jesus" star Regina Hall joins Drew to chat. Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Plus, In A Minute Drew and Regina surprise one lucky audience member with a big prize!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew is chatting with John Stamos! "A League of Their Own" star Abbi Jacobson is joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk to cover today's hottest headlines.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Camilla Cabello opens-up about dating, what she's looking for in her next partner, working with relationship goals couple Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton on "The Voice" and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Power" star Toni Collette is telling Drew about her new show. Plus she's joining Drew in the kitchen to cook something delicious.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Actress Eva Longoria is joining Drew in the kitchen and they're cooking up Spaghetti Alle Vongole. Best-selling author Lewis Howes joins Drew and Ross Mathewsat the Drew's News desk.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: ESPN Monday Night Football" commentator Joe Buck joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to break down the latest headlines of the day.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Carla Hall joins Drew and Ross Mathews for food news, covering an avocado ripeness detector and TikTok restaurant reviews. Carla makes frittata with Drew, while Lindsay Peers and Tariq join for a Thanksgiving craft at "The Craft Studio.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Yellowstone" star Cole Hauser is sharing all about the new season of his hit show and reveals the possible connection between his family and Drew's!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew is joined by "Shotgun Wedding" star Josh Duhamel to chat about his new film. Inside Edition correspondent Lisa Guerrero is joining Drew and Ross Mathews to cover the headlines in a new Drew's News and dishes on her new memoir.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, it's an all-new Cookbook Club with "Half Baked Harvest" author Tieghan Gerard who is whipping up Finish Spicy Shrimp Tacos.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Poker Face" star Natasha Lyonne is telling Drew about her new show, her partnership with Maya Rudolph and whether she would do an "American Pie" reboot.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Preppy Kitchen: Recipes for Seasonal Dishes and Simple Pleasures" cookbook author John Kanell joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk for Drew's News: Food Edition.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Julio Torres is joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to cover today's hottest headlines. Then, deleted scenes from this season's Drewber rides. Drew and Ross are celebrating national pie day.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are hitting the headlines covering a new middle seat airplane lottery and whether hearing birds can help boost your mood.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Renowned OBGYN Dr. Suzanne Gilberg-Lenz is answering burning questions about sexual health including activities that could affect male fertility.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Icon Martha Stewart and Drew tackle relationship red flags at the news desk and Martha reveals which young star she simply adores.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Chef Ronnie Woo is cooking up a storm with co-host Ross Mathews. Then, Drew and Ross discuss some of the latest and greatest headlines.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Office" star Rainn Wilson is joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to cover topics like the surprising reason Kate Winslet has a hard time re-watching herself in "Titanic".

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Bronwyn Tarboton is sharing some genius upcycling tips including how to create home décor out of items in your trash.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Long Island Medium" star Theresa Caputo is chatting with Drew about her work as a medium, the show and more. She's also doing a special reading of the studio audience.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts try to turn their newly acquired Beverly Hills dress boutique, The House of Renee, into a country store, The House of Granny.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed sends Elly to the Beverly Hills dress boutique he used to own (now the House of Maurice) to learn how to be a lady, where Mrs. Drysdale mistakes her for royalty.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale wants Jed to incorporate for the tax advantages. So the Clampetts take over the top floor of the Commerce Bank and start doing what they can to stimulate the economy by getting more money into the hands of more people.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny's driving and Ellie's cooking makes a policeman and a cab driver think that the Clampett Mansion is a mental institution.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale gets Jed's old cabin from back home and sets it up in the Clampett's backyard to surprise Granny on her birthday. A coed with a sociology major thinks that they live there as the Drysdale's servants.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drysdale hires a demolition man to remove the Clampett's cabin. Mr. Drysdale decides to occupy the cabin so it can't be removed. The Clampetts think a "homewrecker" is breaking up the Drysdale's marriage.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro's running late for his graduation ceremony despite his new watch. Mrs. Potts of Jethro's school is afraid that his attendance will jeopardize her chances for a new endowment. Cousin Bessie saves the day.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale buys Mammoth Pictures, a movie studio. Jed, Granny, Elly and Jethro try to "help" the studio, which is losing money, by working at the studio.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale tells the Clampetts that he is building a city on the location where Jed's movie studio is located. The Clampetts mistake a western prop town for the city.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts decide to run the store on the empty studio Western set but can't understand why they don't have any customers.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed gets an honorary doctorate when he donates money to the college that Mr. Drysdale attended. Now the family thinks he can now practice medicine, which doesn't sit well with Granny.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drysdale thinks she can get the hillbillies to move out by throwing herself at Jed. Meanwhile Granny is itching to fight her because she fell into the cement pond when Jed had to stop a fight between them earlier.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: An old friend from back in the hills is now an Elvis like singing idol. The Clampetts misunderstand the situation and decide to help Johnny get on his feet.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Johnny Poke's mother arrives from the Ozarks and Granny's matchmaking begins. Jed and Emma Poke come up with a plan to discourage her.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drysdale needs Jed to donate $190,000 to save the Beverly Hills Ballet but he has his hands full trying to keep Granny from heading back to the hills pushing all her stuff in a wheelbarrow.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale talks the butler into staying on, posing as a boarder, so that he can teach the Clampetts how to be more civilized.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts still don't realize that Mr. Pinckney is their butler instead of their boarder. When he tries to leave them Granny thinks he trying to skip without paying his rent.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Hospitalized for nerves from dealing with the hillbillies Mrs. Drysdale threatens Mr. Drysdale to stay there until he gets rid of them and even sending for a specialist. Unfortunately, the Clampet clan is on their way to visit her.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drysdale wakes up to find she is no longer in the hospital. The Clampetts, unhappy with what they feel as the hospital's poor level of care, break her out and set her up in their mansion.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly May goes to Jed's studio to be in a movie and meet a potential husband.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Ellie May loses another suitor to Miss Jane in another case of mistaken identity.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: After the Clampetts accidentally run into a beatnik he moves into the Clampett mansion, but neither he nor they know what to make of each other.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: As a favor to Jed Mr. Drysdale arranges for a playboy bank director (who normally only dates women half his age) to come court Granny, while Jed goes out with a beautiful woman who dates rich older men.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny wants Jed to find a wife and asks for Mr. Drysdale's help. He introduces Jed to Phyllis but learns too late she a gold digger and becomes alarmed when they head to the track. But it's Granny they need to worry about.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro decides to become a "double naught" spy and converts the family's truck into his idea of a Bondmobile. But he becomes the unwitting pawn in another banker's scheme.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale's biggest rival John Cushing succeeds in getting the Clampetts to transfer all of their money to his bank.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drydale's poodle Claude is to enter a dog show but gets sick right before. Granny offers to doctor the dog but Ellie Mae is concerned he doesn't know any tricks so she decides to help out with one of her own pets.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Steve and Janet endure various calamaties on their honeymoon. Just as they are beginning to have a good time, Janet goes into labor. Jackie seeks full custody of Erin, and David and Kelly try to keep their sister's spirits up.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Gina's meeting with her father is unsatisfying, similar to Janet and her parents; Donna can't let go of Noah's accident; Dylan loses control in front of kids, and has second thoughts about Kelly, but is too late.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Donna and David meet promising new mates; Kelly decides to quit the store; Matt violates his suspension; Dylan suffers from fast-lane acquaintances; the Sanders' hire a nanny.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Dylan accedes to Shane's demands for Noah; Kelly and Matt prepare to go on a couples game show; Dr. Martin tries to bond with Gina.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: A news report shows a live dead-ringer for Dylan's late father; Noah intrudes on Donna's meeting someone new; Kelly compromises her personal feelings for her profession; David gets the wrong idea when he overhears Camille talking with friends.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Dylan's father makes him an offer; Steve lobbies for Ryan's return to college; David interviews for a job in New York; Matt represents a stand-up comic fired for not being funny.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Kelly grows suspicious of Matt's distant behavior. Camille tries to convince Donna to sell her clothing online. Steve and Janet fear that her parents' dog is to blame for the death of their snooty neighbors' pet rabbit.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Mitch annoys Donna by trying to plan their entire relationship via an electronic organizer. Janet nixes Steve's plans to invest in Donna's site because of their limited finances.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: Dylan's generous wedding gift vexes Kelly and Matt, who consider moving to Seattle; an offer for their tabloid separates the Sanders' professionally; Noah meets Ellen's family; Donna's mother sells her house.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: David expresses his feelings for Donna by writing her a giant love note in the sand. Dylan graduates from California University. Matt considers moving to New York to help his sister-in-law raise her child.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: After 10 years, the friends of 90210 say goodbye with a wedding, a reunion, and a few surprises! Just as Donna and David are joining together, Kelly's life is falling apart. Meanwhile, Steve and Janet make some major decisions about their future.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E001) Twins Brandon and Brenda Walsh experience a very special kind of culture shock when they move from Minnesota to Beverly Hills and begin their new lives at West Beverly High.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E002) Brandon meets Dylan McKay, a brooding classmate. As they become friends, Brandon learns that Dylan's bad-boy act masks a hidden life that few people ever see.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Is there trouble in paradise for the professor's alliance? And will it lead to a flip on Hisam to send Cameron packing instead of Riley?

programme.desc: Who will survive this epic competition and rise to power, and which Houseguest will end up on the block?

programme.desc: Will the Power of Veto save one of the Chillers from the hot seat, and if so who will become Jared's next target?

programme.desc: Humila Week is under way and the space cowboy is in control. Will Cameron cause chaos and shake up the house?

programme.title: Big Brother

programme.desc: After a humiliating experience on an airplane, Nashawn sues the airline and is awarded a huge settlement. Determined to make good with the money, Nashawn creates the full service airline of his dreams, complete with sexy stewardesses & funky music.

programme.title: Nas: Time is Illmatic (Giant)
programme.desc: The story behind Nas's groundbreaking debut album 'Illmatic,' and the early life of one of the most talented rappers of all time. Featuring Pharrell Williams, Alicia Keys, Q-Tip, and Busta Rhymes.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.desc: Advertising executive Marcus Graham is a quintessential bachelor, Graham is never without a new lady on his arm. Enter Jacqueline, his new boss, and Marcus is on the receiving end of his own patented behavior for the first time!

In an effort to help Lester build his business, Mary takes some questionable steps to land him a big construction contract.
Mary and Lester are shocked when his cousin Ed's enviable 'picture-perfect' marriage suddenly falls apart.

When Mary and Sandra go to court to settle a dispute over song royalties, Sandra's ammunition is veteran 'barrister' John Houseman, while Mary's ace in the hole is a 'Supreme' expert witness, singer Mary Wilson.
Mayhem and murder plague 227 when a mysterious man with a knife rents an apartment in Mary's building.

When Mary and Lester go to the reading of his uncle's will, they are both surprised to learn they have distant cousins whom they've never met, and even more confused when they discover they are a different color.
When Lester's old high school sweetheart comes to the neighborhood in search of a new home, Mary fears that she'll try to move in on more than just her turf.
Suffering from a very cold winter spell, the residents of '227' invade Mary and Lester's apartment, which is one of two apartments with heat.
When Mary and Lester's school teacher friend Mitchell meets Sandra, he sets out to win her pampered heart, no matter how many gifts or expensive dates it takes.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: Prom night could wind up being a date with disaster when Tia and Tamera's escorts behave badly, and Roger's date towers over him.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: Love is in the air when Tamera, Lisa, and Ray all have close encounters of the romantic kind.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: Tia and Tamera rescue a pig who's being mistreated by its owner and attempt to secretly stash the "porker" at home.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: While recovering from "twin appendectomies," Tia and Tamera go in search of hospital records that could reveal the identities of their biological parents.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: When Lisa forbids Tia to see her boyfriend Michael, Tamera acts as a go-between for the couple -- but finds herself falling for him.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: Tia and Tamera take their sisterly bond a little too far when they collide with each other's cars while learning to drive.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: When the "cool crowd" doesn't invite Tia and Tamera to their "happening" party, the twins decide to throw a bash of their own -- which could wind up being a "bust"!

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: A class field trip to a museum lands the twins in detention, while Roger "borrows" a statue that makes him irresistible to women.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: When Tia and Tamera's SAT scores come in, A-student Tia is stunned to discover that Tamera has pulled a higher score than she has.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: After Tamera wins the lead in the school play, she transforms from a calm high school student into the ultimate "drama diva," who's driving everyone -- particularly Tia -- crazy.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: When Tia confides in Tamera that she dreamed of kissing "Stinky Steve," their boss at Rocket Burger, Steve mistakenly believes she's got "the hots" for him.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: A school project in which Tia and Tamera "marry" Michael and Roger proves to be an eye-opening experience for the twins.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: The crew continues to turn up on South Beach. Alex is rushed to the emergency room after he collapses on the beach. Jadah and Tati come to blows. Ceaser throws a Scarfaced-themed party to impress a girl and Donna confesses her feelings to Alex.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Donna is jealous when Ceaser doesn't choose her to help open a new shop in NOLA (which drives a wedge between her and Alex), and Young Bae becomes a citizen and a mother.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Donna catches Alex partying with strippers, Sky's son makes a shocking announcement about his post-graduation plans, and Melody reaches out to her mom's estranged family.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: An old feud flares up when Jadah arrives in New Orleans, Walt confronts Ceaser about calling him a drunk, and Melody's estranged cousin stands her up.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Jadah shares big news, Miss Kitty asks Young Bae for a favor, Sky faces off with Herb, and the staff is shocked when the New Orleans shop is vandalized on opening day.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Ceaser fumes after discovering a New Orleans employee is a mole, Puma and O'S**t take advantage of Young Bae to wreck the 113th shop, and Alex's dad faces a risky surgery.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Ceaser reconnects with his daughter Cheyenne, Young Bae hires a new receptionist who has to prove herself to the crew, and Alex starts to notice some relationship red flags.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Tokie loses it during the crew's team-building retreat, Donna tries to make up with Alex, Young Bae's mom meets Rob for the first time, and Jadah copes with a family tragedy.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Sky gets news about her son Des, Young Bae's mom proves to be a handful for Rob, Tokie tries to work through issues from her past, and Donna issues Ceaser an ultimatum.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Melody's relationship with Lalo begins to fall apart, Ceaser hires Sky's son as an intern to keep him out of trouble, and Donna crashes the shop paint party to apologize.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Ceaser freaks out when Sky decides to open her own side business in Miami, Melody struggles to keep her family together, and Jadah gets revenge on Teddy for dating Tati.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Sky goes behind Ceaser's back to open her boutique in Miami, Young Bae's mom pressures her daughter to get married in two weeks, and Donna's twin sister disapproves of Alex.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: The shop is divided over Ceaser's choice to replace Sky, Young Bae and Rob receive devastating news, and Teddy flips when Tati gets wasted and goes home with another guy.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: The crew parties in bougie Westchester, NY, before Bae's wedding, "father-of-the-bride" Ceaser is pissed to learn O'S**t is invited, and Tati tries to mend things with Teddy.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Cash-flow problems strike the family when Suzanne's credit issues surface and Nick's work necessitates a new van.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Nick tries to help his mother forge bonds with Kevin and Lindsey. Meanwhile, Suzanne gets the day off.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Young Kevin gets a kick out of soccer, but Nick doesn't see the appeal. Meanwhile, Lindsey's secretiveness exasperates Suzanne, who then snoops online into her teen daughter's private life.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: When a rat gets lost in the home, Kevin scurries to care for it. Meanwhile, an ex-flame creates surging tension between Lindsey and Gigi.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Suzanne isn't a sport when Nick watches a game with friends at a sports bar with alluring waitresses. Elsewhere, the children ask for more allowance, but they reject doing any added chores.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Suzanne becomes a viral-video sensation after she's caught dancing on camera. Meanwhile, Marilyn serves up soul-food lessons to young Lindsey.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Lindsey taps into her mother's credit card to order a sweater. Elsewhere, Kevin feigns being ill to score a coveted baseball jersey.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: An exhausted Nick resists Suzanne's romantic advances, leading her to worry about the health of their relationship.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Shelly Williams (series star EVE) is a beautiful and intelligent 25-year-old clothing designer trying to navigate the exhilarating worlds of love, sex, romance and career in Miami.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: After a 10-month romantic drought, Shelly finds it difficult to resist new guy J.T., but her friend Janie cautions her to slow down and get to know him--especially after noticing a jumbo box of condoms in his shopping cart.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Rita and Janie persuade Shelly that she should know more about the man she's dating than that he's incredibly sexy, so Shelly resorts to snooping through J.T.'s stuff to get to know him better.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Surprised to see J.T. with another woman at Rita's party, Shelly flirts with a former boyfriend, Khalif to make J.T. jealous, which leads to a discussion about dating exclusively.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Shelly and J.T. take salsa lessons, but J.T. gets frustrated by his clumsiness, while Shelly continues lessons with handsome dance instructor Tony. J.T. must decide what's more important--his ego or sharing something with Shelly

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: After spending lots of money taking Shelly out to expensive dinners and a concert, J.T. begins to feel frustrated that she never pays for their dates. Shelly brags to Rita and Janie that J.T. treats her like a queen.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Shelly and J.T. prepare to celebrate their 3-month anniversary with a romantic weekend getaway until J.T. realizes he's already committed to play in a basketball tournament with his friends, including competitive Trevor

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: When J.T.'s mother walks in on Shelly and J.T. in bed, Shelly fears their romance will be ruined unless she can win his mother's acceptance and respect.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: J.T. feels his privacy has been invaded after Shelly shares their bedroom details with her girlfriends. Performer MISSY ELLIOTT makes a special guest-starring appearance as herself at Donovan's Z Lounge.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: When J.T.'s sexy, successful ex-girlfriend, Corryn, comes to Miami for a surprise visit, Shelly doesn't trust J.T. and Corryn, so she tries various ways to keep her man from being tempted by his former lover.

programme.title: Girlfriends
programme.desc: The ladies return home from their very eventful trip to Jamaica where Joan unintentionally ruined Toni's relationship.

programme.title: Girlfriends
programme.desc: Joan continues to suffer in her troubled friendship with Toni and her new relationship with her therapist, Dr. Bales.

programme.title: Girlfriends
programme.desc: Torn between her two worlds, Joan struggles with her professional duty while at the same time dealing with the guilt that she is not being true to herself or her beliefs.

programme.title: Girlfriends
programme.desc: Maya buys a dress that is too expensive knowing it might cause problems with her husband, Darnell. Joan treats herself to a trip to New York to visit her boyfriend, realizing the distance between the two of them is a problem.

programme.title: Girlfriends
programme.desc: Joan ends the friendship between her and Toni after finding out that Toni has been discussing her personal life with co-workers behind her back. Meanwhile, Lynn is trying to cope with her new living situation with Vosco, and his lack of a job.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Héroes olvidados
programme.desc: Cuando Danny y su familia son amenazados por Thomas Wilder (Louis Cancelmi), un asesino en serie que Danny no ha podido detener, la preocupación de Linda se intensifica por el trabajo de su marido y por el estado de su matrimonio.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Resistencia
programme.desc: Erin retoma un caso de homicidio estancado y, con la ayuda de Anthony Abetemarco, busca un testigo clave que había desaparecido.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Las banderas de nuestros padres
programme.desc: Danny es interrogado por el investigador del fiscal de distrito cuando su expareja es acusada de colocar pruebas para cerrar un caso de homicidio.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando tres empleados de restaurantes mueren en un robo/homicidio en Las Vegas, Nevada, la UAC busca pistas en un caso cerrado que sucedió en la ciudad hace seis años.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando la UAC investiga incidentes de cadáveres que son incorporados en el macabro arte del graffiti en Detroit, sospechan que un escurridizo, pero notorio artista callejero podría ser el sospechoso.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando asesinan a una mujer en una pequeña ciudad de Florida, habitada enteramente por delincuentes sexuales, La UAC se enfrenta a una comunidad repleta de sospechosos. Además, Lewis tiene una oportunidad profesional que puede llevarla lejos de la UAC.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC ayuda a la hija periodista de Rossi, Joy (Amber Stevens West), a investigar la desaparición de una alumna de la universidad.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Gibbs se une al Agente Fornell del FBI para investigar su intento de asesinato. Pero terminan enfrentando una situación inesperada cuando la ex esposa de ambos se involucra.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Es Navidad y Tony DiNozzo no sabe si ser desagradable o bueno cuando su papa, Anthony DiNozzo padre llega de visita.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Mientras el equipo de NCIS investiga una conexión entre la muerte de un periodista y un oficial Naval, Ziva recibe una sorpresiva visita de su padre, a quien no vió en más de dos años.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Luego de un evento que acontece cerca de casa, el equipo de NCIS se une para buscar respuestas y pedir justicia en pos de proteger a los colegas más vulnerables.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Las banderas de nuestros padres
programme.desc: Danny es interrogado por el investigador del fiscal de distrito cuando su expareja es acusada de colocar pruebas para cerrar un caso de homicidio.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Maldito
programme.desc: Cuando un mafioso local es asesinado a tiros en su auto, Danny y Báez intentan obtener información del chico de los recados de bajo nivel de la mafia que encuentran atado en el maletero antes de que la pandilla tome represalias.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Viejos tiempos
programme.desc: Cuando el primer socio de Frank anuncia sus planes de publicar un libro lleno de historias de sus primeros días en la policía, a Frank le preocupa que sus historias personales se hagan públicas.

programme.title: The Last Cowboy
programme.desc: In the first annual Run for a Million in Las Vegas, the riders compete for the first-ever million-dollar purse in horse-reining history.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds of hopefuls arrive at AT&T Stadium to start the rigorous audition process for the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders, competing for the fewest number of open spots ever.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The 101 remaining hopefuls must master tough choreography, learn the famous DCC kick line and impress judges Melissa Rycroft and Charm La'Donna.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The candidates give panel interviews and solo performances before the rookies and veterans face off on the field and find out who makes it to training camp.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The pressure is on at training camp as both rookie and veteran candidates give it their all in front of their toughest audience yet.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli gives the ladies a tough kick line and jump-split workout, and choreographer Travis Wall teaches them a modern dance that will determine their future in the competition.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Charm La'Donna teaches the candidates a hip-hop-style routine, the judges pick their charm squad, the ladies visit the Dallas VA Medical Center and two rookies are sent home.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The candidates audition for the show group, an honorary contingent of 18 cheerleaders who represent the DCC on USO tours and TV, in front of guest judge Cheryl Burke.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Emmy-winner Tyce Diorio teaches the ladies to bring the magic as he puts them through a tough routine. Evan Miller challenges the DCC's power and musicality.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The DCC take the field for the first time in their signature DCC boots. Learning the DCC entrance proves very challenging for some, while others struggle to get accustomed to dancing in cowboy boots. Melissa Rycroft is featured.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The recruits do media training with NBC 5 Dallas-Fort Worth lead news anchors Meredith Land, Kelli, and Judy name two triangle points, and guest judge Melissa Rycroft sits in.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The ladies put their modeling skills to the test on photoshoot day, Julia tries to bounce back after her car accident, and the dancers get a lesson in healthy cooking.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With one week until the start of the season, Kelli and Judy make a tough cut, the show group performs for the first time, and Charlotte Jones Anderson judges rehearsal.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: To make their final cut, Kelli and her team try to find one hopeful of the remaining 37 who isn't ready to perform at the Cowboys' home opener.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies catch up to a group of teenagers enjoying a night of joyriding. A traffic stop opens the doors to recovery for a very repentant suspect. A suspect insists his car is not stolen because he did his online research.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A driver theorizes about America after fleeing a traffic stop, charges keep adding up for an unlicensed driver, and a woman stops at nothing to get to her trailer.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A female victim tells the officers that two men kicked in her front door. Three suspects attempt to steal a bicycle in an alley. Following routine questioning of a petrified wife, officer arrests the husband for domestic abuse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers encounter an unusual situation where the victim and suspect have barricaded themselves inside the house. Officers respond to a domestic dispute at a nearby apartment complex. A man explains how his ex-girlfriend climbed into his window.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers track down a suspect who eluded them earlier, a suspicious vehicle takes off at the sight of police, and a man gets busted for possession in front of his mom.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man assaults his sister and her dog, a gibberish-speaking man is arrested for attacking his neighbors, and a couple with no-contact orders tells conflicting stories.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police deploy spike strips to curb a stolen vehicle, a parolee at large speeds away with a two-month-old in the car, and officers try to determine the details of a stabbing.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A deputy questions a driver about why his broken-down car looks like it’s been in an accident. Obstacle after obstacle prevents a woman from fixing her janky vehicle. A young man looking for a fresh start falls on hard times.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect forgets to drive away after breaking into a used car lot. A dispute over money ends in tire slashing. Suspects are found with narcotics and tall tales.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police are led on a lengthy chase, a man is pulled over in a new car he doesn't own, and a detained woman has choice words about her boyfriend.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man and woman are pulled over while out on a candy run. A simple traffic violation turns into a multi-vehicle police pursuit. Deputies are notified of a stolen car and find the driver in possession of an interesting tool.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A knife wielding man hangs around the lot of a convenience store. An intoxicated man in speedos flees from the police after urinating in a parking lot. An officer responds to a domestic dispute after a man locks his girlfriend in the bathroom.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A distinctive tattoo reveals a wanted felon’s true identity. Deputies talk to a young woman who traded one bad habit for another. A man in possession of a stolen vehicle tells officers how his day went from bad to worse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman asks police to get involved after her ex threatened to destroy her home. Prior medical procedures drive a woman to find a dangerous way to ease her pain. Deputies search for a mysterious driver who fled a car crash.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers engage in a bizarre slow-speed chase after a suspect’s failure to stop. A woman is pulled over after leaving a known drug house. An officer pursues two illegal drag racers on a public highway.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A traffic stop becomes dangerous when the suspect takes off on the interstate. Officers find a large bag of drugs in a man’s pants. Officers respond to a dispute at a familiar location.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man wrecks his friend's car while fleeing police, detectives arrest a man wanted for armed robbery and attempted murder, and officers spy a subject who eluded them earlier.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man riding a bike at night with no lights decides to take off rather than talk with police, and a dangerous domestic dispute unfolds on the streets of Texas.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A white-knuckled police chase ends in a dramatic escape and an unsettling officer injury. An intoxicated prowler is reported after a woman spots him in a tree. Officers bring in the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspicious van.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man complains of heart trouble after running from police, a suspect in a stolen car leads officers on a wild chase, and police check on a disabled vehicle and its occupants.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A chatty motorist becomes agitated when officers start asking questions, a fleeing driver calls his wife in the middle of a pursuit, and deputies catch a man in a lie.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers arrest a couple during an argument over who the narcotics belong to. Police seize a large bag of marijuana after a routine stop. A man is caught harboring drugs under his tongue during questioning.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A patrol car en route to a call spooks a driver who then takes off at high speed, leading the officers to pursue him instead, and police investigate shots fired on a home.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man on a motorcycle evades an officer, a woman in a suspicious vehicle accrues multiple charges, and a traffic stop reveals two men under the influence.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A jumpy bicyclist mistakenly reveals more than he had planned, and officers search a darkened building in an attempt to thwart a robbery in progress.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police arrest a suspect for armed robbery. A six foot alligator is found on a homeowner's back porch. An Officer assists in an undercover sting.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer shows up as Coco the Clown in an undercover sting. The Vice unit conducts a reverse-prostitution sting designed to capture suspected “johns.”

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A high profile murder trial is thrown into a tailspin when two siblings confess to the same crime.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Science collides with the occult when the team investigates the case of a psychic who predicted her own murder.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSIs enter the world of rap music in order to investigate the deaths of three teenagers killed while working for rival rappers.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Solving the case of a wealthy defense attorney killed at her son's wedding is compromised when all of the evidence is stolen along with Nick's car.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The evidence in the case of a high-stakes gambler and ladies man murdered outside a casino after a night of revelry proves that appearances can be deceiving.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A man accused of murdering his wife and co-workers leads the CSIs on a wild chase through a busy Vegas casino.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team rallies around one of their own, who is shot in the line of duty and may not survive on the sixth season finale.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: While Grissom leads a group of college students on a tour of CSI, the dead speak while the CSIs investigate, each narrating their own case

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate first-hand the behind-the-scenes action of Cirque du Soleil in order to determine what may have contributed to a young dancer's untimely death.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom is fascinated when every detail of a miniature is identical to that of a real crime scene, and he goes about trying to solve the case using the clues provided.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When an innocent man is brutally attacked and beaten to death by what looks like a monster in a black cape, the CSIs are called to investigate, only to learn that a similar attack took place minutes later.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a dead woman is found hanging from a cross inside a church, the team follows the evidence to uncover a bizarre love triangle dating all the way back to the victim's high school days.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When two young boys are reported missing, a known neighborhood sex offender is the primary suspect.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: While investigating an elderly woman's murder, Grissom receives a miniature crime scene replica; Greg attends a hearing to ascertain his culpability in a teenager's accidental death.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI se reúne en torno a uno de los suyos, al recibir un disparo en mientras cumplía su trabajo y es posible que no sobreviva en el final de la sexta temporada.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mientras Grissom guía a un grupo de universitarios en un tour por CSI, los muertos hablan mientras los CSI investigan, cada uno narrando su propio caso

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Los CSI investigan de primera mano los entresijos del Cirque du Soleil para determinar qué pudo contribuir a la prematura muerte de una joven bailarina.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom se siente fascinado cuando cada detalle de una miniatura es idéntico al de la escena de un crimen real, y se pone manos a la obra para intentar resolver el caso utilizando las pistas proporcionadas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un hombre inocente es brutalmente atacado y golpeado hasta la muerte por lo que parece un monstruo con una capa negra, los CSI son llamados para investigar, sólo para enterarse de que un ataque similar tuvo lugar minutos después.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando una mujer muerta aparece colgada de una cruz en el interior de una iglesia, el equipo sigue las pruebas para descubrir un extraño triángulo amoroso que se remonta a los días de instituto de la víctima.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando se denuncia la desaparición de dos niños, el principal sospechoso es un conocido delincuente sexual del barrio.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mientras investiga el asesinato de una anciana, Grissom recibe una réplica en miniatura de la escena del crimen; Greg asiste a una vista para determinar su culpabilidad en la muerte accidental de un adolescente.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando dos gemelas idénticas aparecen muertas, las pruebas en ambos casos no demuestran inmediatamente una conexión entre las dos muertes.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo investigan una serie de asesinatos en Las Vegas que podrían estar relacionados con un infame jefe de la mafia de los años 70 que desapareció hace muchos años.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando los CSI procesan pistas tras un asesinato en una planta de fabricación de aves de corral, las pruebas les conducen a la casa de un hombre que colecciona trenes en miniatura y otra parafernalia en miniatura.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El testimonio de Catherine ante el tribunal no es suficiente para condenar a un asesino sospechoso de asesinar a su propia madre.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El principal sospechoso del sonado asesinato del asambleísta Danilo Zamesca es Thomas Simon, el mayor proveedor de drogas de la costa oeste.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando Catherine y Keppler comienzan a investigar el asesinato de una desconocida adolescente, ambos coinciden en que el asesino, que fue meticuloso a la hora de eliminar pruebas del cadáver y sus alrededores, es probablemente reincidente.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a pregnant woman is assaulted, Horatio and the team fight for her and her baby's life while tracking down her attacker.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When the investigation of a dead millionaire leads the CSIs to an elite dating service, Ryan poses as a businessman to expose the matchmaker's lies.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a fire hydrant washes away all the evidence at a crime scene, the CSIs must recreate a very bizarre double murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When the CSIs investigate a murder at a roller derby match, the only thing shorter than the girls' skirts are their tempers.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Miami is ablaze with crime and chaos when Memmo Fiero, Horatio Caine's wife's killer, returns to take control of the city.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio Caine and the CSI team try to figure out which of the nerds took revenge when a high school bully is stoned to death.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a woman narrowly escapes death at the hands of a serial killer, Horatio will do anything to track down the psychopath.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio Caine and the CSI team uncover an exclusive hunting club where the prey is human, the most dangerous game of all.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a delivery truck driver and a housewife on his route are murdered, Horatio Caine and the CSI team try to find their connection.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: An escaped prisoner takes Natalia hostage and tells her a shocking secret about his crimes. Horatio Caine and the rest of CSI the team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio Caine has decided to protect a mixed martial arts fighter from his dangerous brother who recently escaped from prison.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When the CSIs find a co-ed dead in a hot tub, they investigate a case marked by jealousy, psychosis and college roommates.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When Horatio Caine chases down a mysterious murder suspect, he discovers that the man's entire life is an elaborate charade.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: After Horatio captures the last prison escapee, their transport plane crash lands, and they discover the fugitive has more planned than a getaway.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Al un modelo ser asesinado, Horatio y el equipo de CSI deben integrarse al mundo del modelaje para encontrar al asesino.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Después de que una celebridad es asesinada en una fiesta de famosos, el equipo de CSI descubre una plancha falsa que produce billetes de cien dólares. Horatio investiga.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El equipo debe investigar cuando Calleigh se sale de la carretera y cae a un canal, lo que compromete la evidencia de la escena del crimen que ella acaba de encontrar.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Después de que todo un vecindario se entera de que los están obligando a dejar sus hogares, el político local que apoya la expropiación es asesinado.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI debe investigar un caso extraño relacionado con el vudú y se asustan cuando comienzan a ocurrir accidentes extraños en el laboratorio.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Un caso de secuestro se vuelve personal para Horatio y el equipo de CSI cuando la víctima inesperadamente resulta ser la hermana de Boa Vista.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando un hombre es decapitado mientras realiza un atrevido truco con su auto, el equipo sospecha que fue más que un simple accidente.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio descubre un complot mortal contra la ciudad de Miami después de que una joven es asesinada en un evento benéfico. Él y el equipo de CSI investigan.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando un reclutador de marines es asesinado, el equipo de CSI debe adentrarse en el mundo del reclutamiento de soldados y las familias que dejan atrás.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Están juzgando a Sonya Barak por ayudar en un complot para destruir Miami cuando su propia gente intenta matarla a tiros. Horatio y el equipo de CSI investigan.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando asesinan al exmarido de Natalia, la evidencia sugiere que ella lo mató. Muchas personas tenían motivos para matar a Nick. Horatio y los CSI investigan.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: La vida del detective Frank Tripp pende de un hilo cuando pisa una mina terrestre mientras investiga la escena de un crimen. Horatio y el equipo de CSI investigan.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando secuestran un camión lleno de armas confiscadas y devuelven las armas al público, Horatio relaciona el crimen con Clavo Cruz.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Declaran muerto a un miembro del equipo tras recibir un disparo en la cabeza. No queriendo darse por vencido, Horatio hace que el equipo de CSI corra al hospital.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The home invasion murder of a college student sends Detectives on the trail of China White, uncut heroin that has fallen into the wrong hands.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: An armed suspect is uncovered at a secured crime scene. The routine investigation becomes a foot pursuit through the subway tunnels of New York City.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Detectives discover the investigation of a vehicular homicide victim collides with a Boston Baseball fan found dead in a parking lot.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: When a casual breakfast turns into a shootout, Detective Mac Taylor must put the pieces of the crime back together again.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: It’s summer in the city as Mac and Hawkes investigate the suspicious death of a free climber attempting to scale the Empire State Building.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Stella and Danny investigate why a young, beautiful, and blind woman was left strangled on a rooftop. Did cuddle parties have anything to do with it?

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: It’s mayhem at the Bronx Zoo. Mac, Danny, and new CSI Lindsay Hamilton look into the death of a man thrown to the tigers.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A man found beaten to death at the San Gennaro festival leads Mac and Stella from the alleys of Mott Street to the power players of Wall Street.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac, Stella, and Lindsay discover why a young dancer with a winning lottery ticket in her pocket was thrown from the Roosevelt Bridge Island Tram.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The witness to a brutal elevator slaying has disappeared, and as the CSIs track her down they uncover the world of Manhattan “Lolitas.”

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Detective Mac Taylor and CSI Miami Lieutenant Horatio Caine follow the evidence from steamy Miami to steely New York as they close in on Henry Darius.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: When murder comes to play at a high-stakes poker game, the CSIs work to find out why what they thought was a cheater’s revenge was misidentification.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: In a New York doll “hospital”, Mac and Danny recover the corpse of the doll “doctor” beneath hundreds of body parts – doll body parts.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A rising roller derby star drops dead in the middle of a bout, and Mac and Stella come to the rink to investigate the death.

programme.title: CSI: New York
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI investiga el asesinato de un novio en el día de su boda y la aparición de una caja misteriosa en el capó del auto de Stella.

programme.title: CSI: New York

programme.title: El Juego Del Duende
programme.desc: Después de que un grupo de ladrones es enviado a cazar leyendas urbanas, roban el oro de un duende, solo para descubrir que hay que pagar un alto precio.

programme.title: Portadores

programme.title: Estación zombi
