programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The locals complain that Oliver's penchant for wearing business suits to do farm work is ruining Hooterville's image. Oliver tries to adjust, but the last laugh is on him when Lisa has her dressmaker design Italian him some swanky new overalls.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The Hooterville Chamber of Commerce attempts to attract a Hollywood film studio to shoot a movie in town. And when a rumor spreads that a famous actor is arriving, the townsfolk are all abuzz as they prepare for their close-up, Mr. DeMille!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Fed up with the house being in dire need of repair, Lisa demands that Oliver arrange to have the house redone or she's moving back to New York. Oliver agrees, but is delayed when Mr. Haney claims that their farmhouse is a historic monument.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Everything is topsy-turvy and henhouse hijinks ensue when one of the Douglas' hens is found to be laying square eggs! News of this kind gets around quickly, and the townsfolk all get in on the race to capitalize on the impressive novelty.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver is absolutely determined to have a truly old-fashioned Christmas, including decorating his own farm-grown tree. But warm weather stands in the way and, he discovers, the residents of Hooterville aren't exactly as traditional as he thought.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: In true Hooterville fashion, Oliver (Eddie Albert) discovers that the town is vehemently split as to which weather reporter they trust. As debates rage over which forecast is correct, Oliver plants his tomato crop, hoping for the best.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: After another disastrous effort from Lisa in the kitchen, Oliver implores her to take a home economics class at the local high school. Before she knows it, Lisa is a fully enrolled student...the likes of which Hooterville High has never quite seen.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When the Hooterville City Council appoints Oliver (Eddie Albert) to judge the apple competition at the annual fair, he mistakes the honor for a real judgeship and prepares for his time on the bench! But a run-in with the real law clarifies matters.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa visits Oliver's mother who is recovering from an illness. The doctor advises that she rest in a peaceful environment...and thinks that Hooterville sounds absolutely ideal! Of course, he doesn't know Hooterville, where peace is never…very close.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When Oliver (Eddie Albert) discovers that Hooterville has a still-valid contract to build war planes, he spearheads the opening of a new government defense plant. But as chaos ensues, Oliver soon wonders if the move was a big mistake after all.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa is appointed as head of Hooterville's new Human Humane committee. A perfect fit for animal-lover Lisa, and a relief from her boredom in the countryside, she soon has a menagerie of both farm and exotic animals living at Green Acres.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver takes Lisa along to an agricultural convention. There, Lisa bonds with an ex-gangster couple, who insist upon teaching the Douglas's some of their shortcuts to successful farming. It turns out to be an offer that Oliver can not refuse.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver champions agri-tech as a way to increase productivity on the farm, but when a computer gives its assessment of the Douglas' marriage, Lisa (Eva Gabor) begins to question her union with Oliver. It's bits versus bytes in Green Acres!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Determined to teach his spendthrift wife Lisa how to save money, Oliver insists that she learn about farming...by growing her own vegetables! In her own inimitable fashion, armed with useless pamphlets from Mr. Kimball, Lisa sets to tilling!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When handyman Eb (Tom Lester) reports he has seen little green men piloting flying saucers, everyone in Hooterville takes him at his word…even the Air Force…and soon the Douglas farm becomes the Roswell of the greater Pixley area!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Ralph (Mary Grace Canfield) is distraught when her beloved Mr. Kimball, is fired as the county agricultural agent. Out of a job, Kimball (Alvy Moore) no longer has money enough to marry the lady-carpenter-in-waiting! But wait…did he even want to?

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa weaves the tale of her great, great grandmother, the Queen of the Gypsies, to explain a bizarre family tradition: a woman in her family must marry an American -- but only every fourth generation -- in order to gain a special inheritance.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: After Oliver (Eddie Albert) accidentally drops a hammer on her head, Lisa (Eva Gabor) develops a case of amnesia, with no idea who she is or why she is on a farm in Hooterville…and she adamantly refuses to believe that Oliver is her husband!

programme.title: Green Acres

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa (Eva Gabor) is delighted to learn that her Hungarian mother is planning a visit to their little farm. Much to Oliver's (Eddie Albert) disbelief and dismay, a rumor spreads all around Hooterville that Lisa's mother is a European countess.

programme.title: Green Acres

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver finds himself in a jam after asking Lisa to make him homemade fruit preserves. An episode deliciously devoted to Lisa's culinary escapades, Lisa musters all of her Hungarian might to make Oliver the best peach jam he's ever tasted.

programme.title: Green Acres

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Archaeologist Julian Richards joins the excavation of a subterranean chamber in the Yorkshire Dales where Bronze Age man buried the dead. Plus, there's the first ever prehistoric footprint found in a British cave.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards and Dr Betty O'Brien rely on their expertise and numerous tests to examine the connection between an archaeological site in Donegal and the history of Christianity in Ireland.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Archaeologist Julian Richards joins the team excavating a massive stone coffin from a building site in Bristol, which should shed light on the Romans' extraordinarily industrious and lavish lifestyle.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Archaeologist Julian Richards investigates an impressive coffin dug up in Malesbury Abbey. Among the possible identities of the body within are a Saxon king, and Elmer, a monk who survived his attempt to fly from the top of the Abbey tower.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: A team examines the remains of two crouched bodies found in the isolated Somerset community of Bleadon, where modern DNA testing reveals a picture of the arduous life of iron age farmers.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Today a team works on one of the most impressive Anglo-Saxon graveyards ever discovered, on the US air force base in Suffolk. A warrior is discovered buried besides his horse, encircled by graves holding children, some buried with full size weapon.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: An Archaeologist joins an excavation team as they uncover a rare find from Roman cemetery: a lead coffin, only the second ever to be found in the Roman Winchester. Clues found inside the coffin bring to light the pagan beliefs of a wealthy Roman.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: John visits a couple who wanted to build a garage next to their bungalow.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards joins the excavation of a long-lost chapel and the burials of medieval landowners in a farmer's field in Cheshire. Using science, genealogy and some detective work, the team are able to bring a man face to face with his ancestors.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards studies the Roman sarcophagus discovered at an archaeological site in Spitalfields. The findings include other objects that could reveal some unheard stories from British history.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards studies the artefacts such as bronze brooches, silver rings, amber beads and ivory discovered at an archaeological site in Peterborough.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards investigates the numerous unidentified graves discovered in Buckinghamshire to understand the history of the neighbourhood and its residents.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards tries to piece together the story behind the ruins of Lihou priory. He tries to establish whether the remains found at the site belonged to monks.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards explores excavation sites where remains of human beings are discovered. He uses facial reconstruction technology to illuminate numerous stories lost in the mists of time.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards explores a Bronze Age archaeological site near Stonehenge to piece together the story of a prehistoric hunter who used a bow and arrow.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards delves into the story behind the ancient bones discovered in a field in Gloucestershire. They are a grim reminder of a battle fought thousands of years ago.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards visits Hereford Cathedral to unveil the story behind a medieval burial site. The findings depict a rough picture of the lives led by priests in the past.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards tries to piece together the story of an Iron Age girl whose remains were found at an archaeological site in Bourton-on-the-Water, Cotswold.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Archaeologist Julian Richards examines two unusual Roman burials in Bath, investigating why the deceased were interred against custom, including one in a lead coffin. He traces this period from Christianity's rise to the end of Roman Britain.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards visits the sand dunes near Bamburgh Castle to investigate a burial ground. The findings are likely to help piece together the life story of King Oswald of Bernicia.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards explores the gravesite of Lawrence Spencer, a labourer who played a significant role in construction of St Paul's Cathedral under Christopher Wren during the 1600s.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: Julian Richards explores excavation sites where remains of human beings are discovered. He uses facial reconstruction technology to illuminate numerous stories lost in the mists of time.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Genesis of the Daleks

programme.title: Doctor Who: Genesis of the Daleks

programme.desc: Los competidores deben crear perros calientes de proporciones perfectas para las celebridades Drew Lachey, John O'Hurley, Tom Green, Melinda Clarke, Christopher 'Kid' Reid y Kristy Swanson.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego está despilfarrando su fortuna peor que nunca, mientras que Pitipú, Don Sebas y Gaspar buscan solucionar el problema de plomería del edificio Pino.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego busca desesperadamente una forma para recuperar su fortuna, mientras que el Abuelo se hace adicto al videojuego de moda.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego todavía no puede asimilar que perdió toda su fortuna, mientras que el Abuelo malaconseja a Peluzín de cómo pagar la renta atrasada de su departamento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Irma organiza un club de peleas clandestinas, mientras que Pitipú decepcionado de sus conocimientos Bíblicos, decide embarcarse en el camino del mal.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Pitipú busca ayudar a Don Sebas con su problema de peso, mientras que Peluzín y el Noruego buscan aprovecharse de un afamado cantante del edificio.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Un extraño virus se empieza a propagar, infectando a todos en el edificio, mientras que el Abuelo y Jonathan buscan revivir a Irmita después de que Peluzín la deja en coma.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El colegio organiza un viaje todo pagado a Acapulco para reforzar la relación "Padres e Hijos", y todos buscan colarse a esa vacación, así tengan hijos o no. Al final la vacación no resulta como esperaban.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego descubre por accidente que cuenta con poderes mentales y decide aprovecharlos para su conveniencia, mientras que el Diablo sube del inframundo para buscar un nuevo asistente en Peluzín.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo sufre un accidente y es llevado de emergencia al hospital pero no es posible la operación. Deciden esperar a que se cure solo, llevándose una sorpresa. Mientras tanto, Olaf decide pedirle ayuda escolar a Jonathan y termina por aprovecharse.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego está cansado de la mala racha que ha tenido con las mujeres y busca el consejo de Pitipú, mientras que Peluzín le pide ayuda a Jonathan para poder encontrar a su verdadero padre.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Mientras que el Abuelo está vuelto loco por encontrar su revista favorita, Peluzín desentierra la verdad sobre su verdadera familia.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Olaf se lleva una sorpresa muy desagradable al estar instalando su altar de muertos, mientras que el Abuelo se burla de Gaspar frente a toda su oficina lo que ocasiona una guerra entre ambos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Peluzín trata de averiguar el paradero de su madre con la ayuda de sus dos nuevos papás, mientras que Gaspar invita al Abuelo, el Noruego y Johnny a el nuevo restaurante de moda.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo y Peluzín buscan lucran aprovechando el próximo paro de agua en la ciudad, mientras que el Noruego nos revela por fin después de tanto tiempo el porque de su miedo al baño.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Los Lambreton son los encargados de organizar la fiesta navideña de este año en su casa, mientras que Don Sebas extraña a su país natal y piensa en regresar.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo despierta la curiosidad en el Noruego por conocer a su padre y este le pide ayuda a Gaspar para que lo acompañe en esta misión que ha hecho como su única prioridad. Mientras tanto el Abuelo encamina a Jonathan en su despertar sexual.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Viendo la tele en la sala de su casa de repente el Abuelo y el Noruego son golpeados con una nueva idea para lucrar en un popular programa de TV. Mientras tanto Peluzín se aventaja de un descuido de Gaspar.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo sufre un accidente y mientras esta al filo de la muerte revalora su vida desde sus inicios recordando una parte de su infancia, la que busca esclarecer una vez recuperada su salud.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se topa de manera inesperada con su Némesis de la infancia y junto con Gaspar se embarca en una cruzada para recuperar un objeto muy preciado de manos de su archienemigo.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Este capitulo completo es una sátira de la típica historia de telenovelas que ha puesto a México en el mapa como el mas su fuerte exponente, sin reflejar necesariamente algún estándar de calidad.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego recibe una visita inesperada con una noticia que le cambiara la vida. Mientras tanto Jonathan le ayuda a Peluzín para prepararse para una prueba muy importante.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una aparición religiosa se manifiesta en el baño del departamento y poco tardan el noruego y el abuelo en encontrarle una ventaja a esta situación.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar y el Abuelo sufren un accidente en el desayuno que les trae muchos problemas. Mientras Jonathan necesita el apoyo de su familia para una presentación en la escuela.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The nation of Carib is in political upheaval, and Fujiko is in the thick of the action, naturally. What is she doing posing as a reporter? Will revolutionary Philadel Kest win her heart where Lupin has failed? And what is Goemon doing on that fighter jet?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A fortune-teller supposedly able to predict his clients' deaths is for some reason seeking out Lupin's prior victims and giving them some very disturbing readings. What's the connection to Fujiko Mine, and how far will she go to see this job through?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Magical realism plus human trafficking plus Lupin and Daisuke Jigen plus a spa vacation plus Fujiko off the deep end equals... Well, you'll just have to find out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Count Almeida has a job for Lupin, and he's not about to take no for an answer. When Lupin and Zenigata both separately make their way to the Count's villa seeking answers, the trail of clues leads to a ghost town with just one inhabitant.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A recent string of particularly flashy thefts has been tied to Fujiko Mine, who seems to have taken to sending written warnings to the police just like Lupin does. But if you ask Inspector Zenigata, something smells fishy about the whole thing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Oscar's body is missing, girls are being kidnapped all over the world, and Lupin still hasn't made good on his threat to steal Fujiko Mine. There's only one thing to do: It's time to pay a visit to one Count Luís Yu Almeida.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: In the season finale, all the players have finally come together, and it's time to see how the tale ends.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #13: Alcatraz Connection
programme.desc: Master thief Lupin III, gunslinger Jigen and swordmaster Goemon are back for a new caper, this time aboard the casino-ship Machine Gun Kelly. Between the mafia, interpol, and a secret organization based under Alcatraz!

programme.title: El agua es nuestro futuro

programme.desc: El director Franklin es despedido tras aparecer como invitado en iCarly. Spencer contrata a una estrella del rodeo para que le enseñe a montar un toro mecánico.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly, Sam y Freddie deben tener una sesión de citas rápidas ya que se ven abrumados de chicos que quieren llevar a Carly a un baile. Spencer realiza un régimen de ejercicios extraño.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly, Sam y Freddie ayudan a una estrella de pop; Spencer descubre que su cita es la madre de Gibby.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly se enamorada de Freddie después de que él salva su vida; Sam y Spencer compiten uno contra el otro en una máquina de juego.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Después de estar de acuerdo para ayudar a un par de cómicos a hacer un vídeo, Carly y Sam debe elegir lados cuando los cómicos empiezan a luchar; Spencer se obsesiona con ganar un bote.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Después de estar de acuerdo para ayudar a un par de cómicos a hacer un vídeo, Carly y Sam debe elegir lados cuando los cómicos empiezan a luchar; Spencer se obsesiona con ganar un bote.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja y Calamardo se quedan varados en el desierto mientras entregan una pizza; Bob Esponja pierde su casa piña.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja y Patricio escuchan que sus héroes viven en una residencia de ancianos y deciden ir a buscarlos para que sigan defendiendo el bien; Bob Esponja pierde la confianza en sí mismo cuando Lubina le reclama que olvidó poner los pepinillos.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Ahora le toca a Bob Esponja ser el Monitor en la Escuela Náutica; Bob esponja lleva una medusa salvaje a casa pero se multiplica y toman el control.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Arenita envía un cohete al espacio; Don Cangrejo da a Bob Esponja un par de botas chillonas.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja decide tratar de vivir con las medusas; Calamardo intenta vender su casa a pesar de sus vecinos molestos.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Hay un concurso de talentos en el Rusty Krusty en "Culture Shock" y en "F.U.N." Bob Esponja decide tratar de entablar amistad con el malvado Plancton.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja ordena unas armas falsas; Calamardo finge ser un fantasma.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja lleva a la hija de Don Cangrejo al baile escolar. Bob Esponja y Calamardo compiten por ser el empleado del mes.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: En `SB-129', Calamardo accidentalmente se encuentra a sí mismo en el futuro, y para su sorpresa extraña a Bob Esponja, luego en `Karate Choppers', Bob Esponja y Sandy descubren el karate.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: En `Sleepy Time' Bob Esponja visita los sueños de sus amigos y vecinos. Mientras que en `Suds', Bob Esponja llega con una enfermedad que lo transforma en fabricante de burbujas.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Don Cangrejo convence a Bob Esponja y Patricio de unirse a él en una búsqueda del tesoro. Bob Esponja se sube al autobús equivocado.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja deja a todo el mundo enojado con sus bromas del Día de los Inocentes; Bob Esponja tiene el reto de cocinar para el Rey Neptuno y decide participar en un concurso entre cocineros.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Don Cangrejo advierte a SpongeBob que se mantenga alejado de los anzuelos; Bob Esponja convoca a su héroes favoritos para las emergencias.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Patricio y Bob Esponja aprenden a atar sus zapatos; Calamardo está a cargo del Crustáceo Cascarudo.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Todo Fondo de Bikini huye de Bob Esponja y Patricio le dice que es por ser feo, pero en realidad tiene mal aliento; Perlita obtiene un trabajo en el Crustaceo Cascarudo, se encarga de ponerlo a la moda.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Patricio está encantado cuando recibe un premio, pero por desgracia, era para Bob Esponja; luego, Bob Esponja hace un nuevo amigo, una burbuja que le hace compañía, lo que hace que la gente piense que está loco.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja tiene que lidiar con unas peligrosas bombas-tartas piratas; luego, Plankton construye un falso Don Cangrejo para obtener la receta de Krabby Patty.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja inventa hamburguesas con colores; Sandy pone a Bob Esponja y a Patricio a cuidar de su oruga.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja se pregunta si se puede ser grande y todavía besar a su abuela; Calamardo se muda de Fondo de Bikini.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja se esconde de Sandy; Bob Esponja y Patricio piden prestado un globo de una tienda y accidentalmente lo revientan.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja y Patricio se cuelan en Treedome; Gary sigue a Patricio por los alrededores y Bob Esponja se pone celoso.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: La Sra. Puff hará cualquier cosa para asegurarse que Bob Esponja pase su examen de manejo y Bob Esponja descubre que su héroe no es tan importante.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: SpongeBob cuenta chistes maliciosos; SpongeBob falla su examen de conducir; SpongeBob cuida el hogar de Mermaid Man y Barnacle Boy.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja sigue a Arenita en una serie de actividades extremas; luego, Bob Esponja trata de ocultar lo que le hizo a una ostra en el zoológico.

programme.title: Bob Esponja
programme.desc: Bob Esponja va a trabajar para Plankton; Bob Esponja crea un GarabatoEsponja, quien le juega bromas a todo el mundo, obligando a Bob Esponja a borrarlo.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations

programme.desc: Tony becomes enamored with Provencal culture and cuisine.

programme.desc: Tony savors the offerings at eateries and street vendors in Ecuador.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: Did You Murder My Daughter?
programme.desc: Two years ago, Latisha and her boyfriend were found shot to death in their car. Latisha’s mother Nancy believes her ex-husband Kenneth was involved. Who is responsible for their deaths?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Kathern says that her perfect marriage fell apart when her husband Lance confessed to kissing another woman, but she thinks there is more! Then, Justine believes Dorian has been sleeping with his best friend, Anayah, but Dorian denies it!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Janisha is done with Terrence's family denying her kids! Janisha got pregnant while her man was in jail, so his family has their paternity doubts! A DNA test will get to the truth, but could the truth be too much to bear for this family?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Ashley and DeNorris accuse each other of cheating. Later, Jim denies serious allegations with his fiancee's sister and other young girls.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Kaliegh is 23 but has been a heroin addict for 5 years. Her mom, best friend, and an ex-boyfriend who got her hooked on heroin are here to beg her to go to rehab. Follow her as she travels to the rehab clinic and tries to get clean!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Kelsey says her husband is abusing her. Malcolm believes that Kelsey has been cheating on him since the beginning and that their two kids may belong to another man. Plus, Carrie's boyfriend Chris thinks their child belongs to her ex.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Nicky and Carissa have been on and off for 8-years, and Donald thinks she's still seeing Nicky. Then Chastity suffered a miscarriage and discovered Sean cheated, but now he says she's cheating with his relatives!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Devon slipped into a coma and is on life support. But before he fell into a coma, he told his mother that his ex Alisha said he did not father their son. Alisha denies ever saying this and feels his whole family has turned their backs on her.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Stephanie says that ever since she came home from work to find her 1-year-old with a black eye, she has feared that her children's babysitter harms them. Sitter Cheryl denies some serious accusations about a child.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: A Shocking Statement
programme.desc: Today on Steve Wilkos, Vanessa reveals a secret she's been hiding from her boyfriend and Joel takes a DNA test to determine if he fathered Melissa's son!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Bob wears diapers every day, even on dates. Bob points out that he does not "use" the diaper, but merely thinks it's sexy to wear it. Our camera crew spent a day with Bob to see how he functions all day wearing diapers and the occasional tutu.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Shirley is here to get her boyfriend, Jackie's, ex out of their lives once and for all! Next, Mike is fed up with both his mother and his wife. He wants his mom to butt out of his life while he dumps his wife for good!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: The show continues with more past guests returning to add to the mayhem!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Jake is here because he says that he knew he was in love with his girlfriend Lindsey the first time she ever asked him for a side of cheese. Then Shaina says she's in love with not one but two beautiful girls.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Beep runs a convenience store and he's fallen in love with the girlfriend of one of the patrons. Next James has been waiting for 5 years to take his revenge on his brother. Then Michelle has a shocking experience with a shocking person!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Our guests today say they have no shame when it comes to affairs of the heart. They say their deceptive ways are catching up with them and that they need to tell the truth!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Kenny lived with sisters Lora and Misty, who are also his lovers but he treats them like servants. Later, Jerry confronts Kenny with the results of the 9 positive paternity tests, but Kenny says he only cares about 2 of his 9 children.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Jennifer se niega a dejar ir a su ex-novio, Marcus. Dice que lo recuperará a toda costa. Luego, Eddie dejó a Glinda y a su hijo de dos años hace 16 años. Hoy, Glinda le dice a Eddie que quiere que vuelva.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Angelo está aquí para contarle a su novia que es mujer. Luego, Mikey ha traído a su novia para contarle que le ha sido infiel. Después, Jennifer siente que debe decirle a su amante la verdad sobre su sexualidad

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Nicole quiere recuperar a su novio, pero solamente si él termina su trío. Mesha ha estado enamorada del mejor amigo de su marido, Jamie, por cuatro años, pero no acepta un "No" como respuesta.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Mehren dice que todo estaría bien con su novio, John, si su esposa los dejara en paz. ¡Greg ha venido a decirle a su novia que le ha sido infiel con su mejor amiga, Yolanda!

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Greg le contará a su novia, Deidra, que trabaja en secreto como prostituto gay. El novio de Madrina sigue siendo infiel a ella con su ex. Después, Ro-Ro tiene dos novias y hoy la obligarán a elegir a una de ellas.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Cliff quiere que Anna, la mejor amiga de su novia, los deje en paz. Después, el marido de Kelly le ruega que lo acepte de regreso, pero Kelly no quiere porque ya está con el hermano de su marido.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Gail quiere más emociones en su vida, por lo que ha estado acostándose con el novio de su mejor amiga. Después, Dave se entera de que su novia de los últimos 3 años tiene una aventura y está dispuesto a todo para recuperarla, incluso ponerse un sostén.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy en MAURY, tenemos a madres y padres muy enfadados en negación. ¡Estos hombres juran que es imposible que sean los padres de los hijos de estas mujeres! Pero, ¿y si tienen razón? ¿Qué respuestas darán los resultados de ADN?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Los invitados del episodio de hoy de MAURY tienen secretos que revelar, pero ¿se arrepentirán de contarlos? Hay relaciones en peligro. Puede que haya corazones rotos. ¿Podrán estas parejas sobrevivir a los secretos que amenazan con separarlos?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy, en MAURY, terminó la espera. Finalmente mostramos los resultados emocionantes de las pruebas de paternidad de ayer. Además, las nuevas parejas están cruzando los dedos para recibir las respuestas que quieren.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy, Marisol regresa por 12º vez para hacer la prueba de su 15º hombre. Luego, Dalyna vino a demostrar que Johnny Mack es el padre de su hijo. Él dice que es imposible porque le parece que el bebé es "demasiado feo" para ser suyo.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Rhonda está segura de que John es el padre de su hijo. ¡Incluso la mamá de John está de acuerdo con ella! Después, Kim y Heather solían ser amigas, pero eso fue antes de que Rick la dejara por Heather. Sin embargo, Kim está segura de que Rick es el padre.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy en MAURY, te pondremos al día con algunos de nuestros invitados más emocionantes. Los resultados de paternidad asombraron a todo el mundo. ¿Qué pasó después de revelar las respuestas y que estos invitados retomaron sus vidas?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Los huéspedes de MAURY han estado ocultando secretos horribles de sus seres queridos y eso les está desgarrando por dentro. ¡Están listos para confesar, incluso si eso les hace perder sus relaciones! ¿Se quedarán o se irán sus seres queridos?

programme.title: Acorralada
programme.desc: Samantha llama a Ignacio para decirle que no le pudo aplicar la inyección a Max porque Diana se lo impidió. Gaby regresa a la mansión.

programme.title: Acorralada
programme.desc: Gaby le pide a Miguelina que le mienta a Larry y le diga que ella está de viaje de luna de miel en Puerto Rico con Kike. Diana y Samantha tienen un nuevo enfrentamiento. Paola escapa de la casa tras pelear con su madre.

programme.title: Acorralada
programme.desc: Pancho tiene remordimientos de todo el daño que le hizo a Caramelo y a Paola por haberlas engañado. Deborah comienza a crear un plan junto a Isabel para vengarse de Diana.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Maribella y Sinaí preparan todo para que cuando Rosaura traiga el café se le caiga encima a Maribella, para echarle la culpa. La doctora le informa a Karina que deben hacerle los exámenes nuevamente.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Teobaldo piensa cumplir lo que le prometió a Mairita pero su mamá lo descubre. Maribella quiere que Luis Mario se acueste con ella. Pero el no lo acepta.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Teobaldo le confiesa a Rosaura que Angeliquita no es hija de su mamá. Gabriel le propone a Minerva que lo ayude a criar a su hijo. Teobaldo le vuelve a decir a Rosaura que no es verdad.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Eduarda llama a Rosaura, diciéndole que su hija está muerta. Karina le dice a Rosaura que no les haga caso. Eduarda y Maribella se ríen por la broma que le gastaron a Rosaura.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: La doctora le informa a Karina que está gravemente enferma debido a su sangre. Mercedes llega cuando Silvano está besando a Rosaura y se mete reclamándole a Silvano que deje tranquila a Rosaura.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Karina, desesperada, se toma una cantidad de pastillas para quitarse la vida. Silvano visita a Teobaldo. Él le va a contar lo de la niña pero se aparece Sonia y se calla por miedo.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Eduarda y Maribella entran a la habitación de Rosaura para ponerle una sorpresa. María Julia le pide perdón a Iván por haber sido una mala madre.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Iván le da ánimos a Karina y le dice que lea la carta de Maximiliano. Luis Mario le cuenta a Gabriel lo que le pasó con Silvano y Rosaura.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Luis Mario se cae del caballo y Silvano se acerca a él. Panchita le cuenta a Samuel todo lo que pasó, incluído lo que hizo Bruno dándole un caballo enfermo a Luis Mario.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Iván y Rodrigo van a la casa de Eva y le sueltan en la cara que esa casa es de Karina, según el testamento de su papá. Silvano va a ver a Rosaura pero Doña Cruz le dice que se vaya.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Rosaura bota a todo el mundo de su oficina. Eduardo y Maribella se van pero Patricio se queda y le dice que quiere hablar con ella de la niña. Karina le dice a Eva que se va a morir.

programme.desc: Don and his team search for the stalker of a pop princess which turns into a murder investigation of a paparazzo.

programme.title: Numb3rs

programme.title: Without A Trace
programme.desc: Jack and the team search for a pregnant woman, Kathy Dobson, who disappeared from a hospital before being told that she has serious complications.

programme.title: Without A Trace
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, Jack and his team search for an office worker, Sydney Harrison (MARSHA DIETLEIN BENNET), who disappeared from her building.

programme.title: Without A Trace

programme.title: Without A Trace
programme.desc: Jack and the team try to find a priest, Father Henry Stephens (HECTOR ELIZONDO), who disappears from his church shortly after learning that he needs a liver transplant to survive.

programme.title: Without A Trace

programme.title: Without A Trace
programme.desc: Four years ago, a young woman, Jessica Raab (AMANDA FULLER), went missing. Vivian uses a new lead from a fingerprint match to convince Jack to get the team involved in Jessica's case.

programme.title: Without A Trace

programme.title: Without A Trace

programme.title: Zodiac

programme.title: The Travel Bug

programme.title: The Travel Bug

programme.title: The Travel Bug

programme.title: Travel In Style

programme.title: Travel In Style

programme.title: Travel In Style

programme.title: Smart Travels with Rudy Maxa

programme.title: Los asesinatos de Midsomer

programme.title: Rules of Engagement

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: The now awakened Ancients meet with O'Neill and Woolsey, thanking them for taking care of the city but also asking them to vacate Atlantis. While Ronon and Teyla stay in the Pegasus galaxy, the rest struggle to resume their lives on Earth.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: The team hear of a great warrior with stories of defeating both the Genii and Wraith and seek him out in hopes of making a new ally. But when they learn this great warrior is none other than Lucius they believe he's up to his old tricks again.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: When Destiny comes upon a heavily damaged ship, Dr. Rush and Col. Young decide to make a dangerous space-suited expedition to the ship. But an unexpected turn of events leaves Dr. Rush and Col. Young stranded aboard the strange vessel.

programme.title: Stargate Universe

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: With no recollection of how they got to the Destiny, crew members left behind over a year earlier make a mysterious return. After an unsettling turn, the memories stirred through regression therapy prove disastrous for those who’ve returned.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: In the hopes of finding something beneficial, the crew follows an energy signature that leads them to a mysterious sea of lifeless ships. With no visible signs of danger, the crew set off to take a closer look. But things may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: An alien that might predate human evolution by 50 million years is discovered in Antarctica and may be part of the race that invented the Stargate. After SG-1 manages to thaw her back to life, they discover she may be the source of a deadly virus.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's cousin, Melancholia, wants to marry Clarence P. Harvey after most of her marital prospects have joined the Foreign Legion. Clarence recoils when Melancholia puts on a campaign to win him, backed by Morticia, Gomez and Clarence's boss.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes a veritable gazelle when he takes dancing lessons at Gomez and Morticia's suggestion after he admits to being a wallflower at social functions. Each member of the Addams Family teaches Lurch a different step.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama's paintings leave an art critic speechless, so Gomez sends for his friend, Sam Picasso, to teach Grandmama to paint in the abstract. The starving artist ignores Grandmama's and Morticia's work as he eats and paints.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Rockland Cartright III is a beatnik who crashes his motorbike into a tree and recuperates at the Addams house. Each regards the other as an oddity, although the family learns to appreciate certain aspects of Rockland's life.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Mr. Briggs, the postman, is hired by the government to do undercover work in the Addams house. While pretending to be a stamp collector, he investigates rumors that coded radio messages are being sent from the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: On a camel trek in Israel, Jack learns first hand about the animal's unique physiology and important contribution to early trade. Later, Jack visits the International Camel Center.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: At Home on the Range

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Going the Distance

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Suzi discover beekeepers working to protect the forest, and Jack meets the sacred cows of Rwanda.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Big cats, gigantic spiders, killer reptiles, stealthy raptors… whether they pack poison, jaws or claws, all of today’s creatures are deadly in their own way.

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In criminal investigations, a simple clue can provide the missing link by placing a suspect at a crime scene. Dirt left on shoes, tires or clothes, or even a tiny piece of plastic can pinpoint a crime scene.

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Drowning deaths often look like accidents and water can destroy the scant clues the killer may have left behind. Investigators must turn to forensic science to solve cases where the victim is found dead in the water.

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Toxicology: While drugs can cure disease and ease pain, they can also be agents of murder. Toxicologists can examine blood and tissue to uncover cases where death is not as natural as it may seem–from slow arsenic poisoning to quick cocaine overdoses.

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: In the premiere of the 15th season, Tom replaces sash balancers on an antique window. Roger and Kevin check out the benefits of a robotic lawnmower. And Richard talks about treating water with lead.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Kevin visits Chicago to explore the dangers of home fires and ways to stay safe. Scott shows off a portable generator that doesn’t run on gas. The guys ask, “What is it?” And Richard finds a rusted sink strainer in the kitchen.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Tom and Kevin use store-bought stair treads to create a bookshelf in Build It. And landscape designer Jenn Nawada transforms the look of a home’s foundation by using existing plants.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Roger helps plant a home orchard using apple and pear trees. Tom shows Kevin how to choose and use a circular saw. Richard installs a new tank water heater and discusses new regulations on them.

programme.title: Ask This Old House

programme.title: Ask This Old House

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: After Messiah and Domani rescue Precious from an asthma attack, Tip makes sure the kids have proper training for any emergency situation. Meanwhile, Tameka and Shekinah head off to a retreat and put their friendship to the test. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: In an effort to teach their family about teamwork, Tip and Tameka take the kids to Space Camp. But when the kids have a difficult time working together, their mission becomes jeopardized. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Shekinahshe seeks help from Tameka to try and find an assistant who can handle her growing work load and personal life. With Domani spending more time in the recording studio, Tip wants him to experience the full studio life. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: When King and Major rattle off a list of what they want to be when they grow up, Tameka decides to expose the boys to alternative options to expand their horizons. Tip makes a Make-A-Wish recipient's dream come true. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: When Tip chaperones Major's field trip to the fire station he takes it to another level with a surprise the kids will never forget. Meanwhile, Tameka's on a mission to get her mom out of the house after her dad's recent passing. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Majors first dance but he has to overcome his fears and ask a girl out on a date, learn to dance, get a suit and corsage. Will Major nerves get the best of him when the big moment comes?

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: The Harris family is embarking on a new business venture together - lemonade! The kids decide they want to start a lemonade business and Tip and Tameka are there to help them every step of the way.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Shekinah has a new hair product for sale and she wants to promote it by enlisting Tameka's help in producing an infomercial. Meanwhile, Tip takes his sons to a very special event.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Shekinah's chain smoking is driving Tameka crazy so she decides to take her to a hypnotist. Tip takes the kids to his old neighborhood where he shocks them with a very interesting hometown game.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Tameka and Shekinah decide to compete in a series of athletic events to determine who's the better athlete with the loser answering to King. Tip takes Domani and Messiah to a real science lab to learn about cool experiments.

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
